instructions: Replace all text between the quotes with your tide station parameters
EMAIL_USERNAME: <email address for the account that issues tide alert messages>
EMAIL_PASSWORD: <email password for the account that issues tide alert messages>
INFLUXDB_TOKEN: <influx write token obtained during InfluxDB installation>
INFLUXDB_ORG: <The name of the organization specified during the InfluxDB installation>
INFLUXDB_BUCKET: <The name of the InfluxDB bucket created to hold the tide stations measurements>
SMTP_SERVER: <The designation of the SMTP server used to issue tide alert messages>
SMTP_PORT: <The SMTP port number user to issue tide alert messages>
SQLPATH: <The full path and file name for the tide SQLite3 database>
TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID: <The TWILIO account SID for issuing tide alert text messages>
TWILIO_PHONE_SENDER: <The phone number that is authorized to send TWILIO SMS messages>
TWILIO_PHONE_RECIPIENT: <The default TWILIO SMS phone recipient (normally one of the administrators>
